summary:
This Mod adds a player home under the exit of the Underforge just outside Whiterunn near
the battle-born-farm. Includes Crafting Area, Cave Garden and more
descriptionHtml:
This is my first uploaded Mod. It adds a Player home under the exit of the Underforge just outside

Whitrun near the Battle-Born -Farm


Featuring
-A complete Crafting Area: Smelter, Black-smith, Workbench,Cooking-pot, Sharpening-stone, Tanning-Rack, Alchemy-lab and Enchanting Table.

- Furniture : King-sized-Bed, Chests and Shelves (more than you will need), enough lighting etc...

- A Garden with all Ingredient creating Plants. And a Special Tree Providing the ultimate
Regeneration Potion

- Dwarven Botanic s (find out what it is yourself )

- A Guardian in front of the entrance preventing everyone to enter the house unless he´s killed

- 1 Additional Suit of temper-able and enchant-able armor (You have to kill the Guardian to get it )

- About 30 new objects and Items added to the Game many with their own new Textures


Installation
NMM: Just install as you would any other mod

Manual: Download file and click & drop the esp-file into the Skyrim/Data Folder

Requirements;
none

Note:
Since this is my first Skyrim Mod. I´d be happy for any kind of feedback and suggestions
You are allowed to use this mod however you like.
author: zitterpappel14
